str2: From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
A tenth part, a tithe. Feminine of dekatos; a tenth, i.e. As a percentage or tithe.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
